mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where we believe you deserve everything without lifting a finger! Get ready to experience banking like never before!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, get this-I was at a fancy restaurant, being my charming self, when the waiter accidentally spilled a drop of water on my tailored suit. The nerve, right? Well, I didn't hold back. I demanded a full refund for my meal, compensation for the dry cleaning bill, and a public apology from the manager. When they hesitated, I dramatically declared that I would never set foot in their establishment again, causing a scene that had other patrons staring in shock. Finally, they caved and offered me all I demanded, plus a gift card for my "troubles." In the end, I left feeling like a king, justified in my entitlement because, let's face it, I'm Hot Josh.
